subject: Golf
organizations: Ladies European Tours Dubai Ladies Masters
lead_paragraph: Annika Sorenstam, playing her second-to-last event before retiring, holed a 45-foot pitch for eagle on the par-5 18th hole to give herself and Suzann Pettersen a 1-up victory over Inbee Park and Eun Hee Ji on Saturday in the Lexus Cup. With the victory in the opening best-ball match at Singapore Island Country Club, Sorenstam and Pettersen helped the International team match Asia at six points entering the closing 12 singles matches. Sorenstam, set to end her Hall of Fame career next week in the Ladies European Tour’s Dubai Ladies Masters, is the International team’s playing captain.
